```{r}
dbl_vector <- c(1, 2, 3, 4) # double = numeric

chr_vector <- c("this", "is", "a", "character", "vector")
log_vector <- c(TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, T, F) # logical
```

```{r}
print(chr_vector)
```
